ctu_text:
- In the case of VJNT, if the applicant fails for a year then the applicant is not paid any reimbursement for that particular year. 
- For Group A – If an applicant pursuing the Group-A course fails in the examination for the 1st time the award may be renewed. For second &amp; sub sequent failure in any class, the Applicant shall bear his / her own expenses until he/she secures promotion to the next higher class. 
- For Group B,C,D,E - he/she has to secure promotion to a higher class (For second &amp; subsequent failure in any class the applicant shall bear his / her own expenses until he/she secures promotion to the next higher class.
